attributes.additional_details:
TO WHOM ITS MAY CONCERN

Dear Prime Minister of UK

I have a very concern about the Aid UK are providing for Africa for the improvement of peoples lives. It is very kind of The Goverment of Uk for doing that. Mr.
Prime Minister my suggetion is this Money should not pay to the Goverment of Africa rather  UK Goverment should used that Aid to set up Contruction Company In the Continent to impove  the infrastrature in the continent of Africa. Mr Prime Minister doing so the the Money will not end up in the corrupt  politicians in Africa.
 I know that UK and the other countries that provide Aid for Africa are trying to help the continent.
Mr President this is only way to move Africa forward  with your Aid.

Thank you very much.
Joseph Tetteh.
